structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXVI. CLIMATE CHANGE ADVISORY TASK FORCE

law.catch_line: Climate Change Advisory Task Force; purpose.

text.section:
Sec. 2-1941. Climate Change Advisory Task Force; purpose.
In accordance with Sections through of this Code, there is hereby created and established an advisory board to be known as the Miami-Dade County Climate Change Advisory Task Force (hereinafter referred to as the CCATF) for the purpose of providing technical assistance and advice to the Board of County Commissioners as to mitigation and adaptation measures to respond to global warming climate change.
